name: options_data
description: Provide real-time Options and Stock data for United States listed options.

ticker.description: Ticker for a Stock, such as 'aapl', 'msft', 'goog' and 'amzn'.

key.description: The api key for using stock-and-options-trading-data-provider.

Proxy_Secret.description: The api proxy secret for using stock-and-options-trading-data-provider.

date.description: A date. Date should be pass as 'yyyy-mm-dd'.

days.description: The number of days to add.

name: get_daily_prices
description: Get the stock price of an entity in the stock market.

symbol.description: The name of the equity of your choice.

key.description: The api key for using alphavantage

name: get_open_info
description: Get information about if the market in the region is open.

key.description: The api key for using alphavantage

name: get_exchange_rate
description: Return the realtime exchange rate for two currencies. They can either be physical or digital/crypto.

from_currency.description: The code of the currency you would like to get the exchange rate for, such as 'CNY', 'USD', 'EUR', 'GBP' and so on.

to_currency.description: The code of the destination currency for the exchange rate, such as 'CNY', 'USD', 'EUR', 'GBP' and so on.

key.description: The api key for using alphavantage.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
